pullRequest.title: optimize:unify the config style and keep defaults consistent
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ⅰ. Describe what this PR did
This PR uniformly converts the configuration style in seata to camel style, and uses the same reference for the default value of client configuration.
Ⅱ. Does this pull request fix one issue?

fixes #2222
Ⅲ. Why don't you add test cases (unit test/integration test)?
I've done integration testing.
Ⅳ. Describe how to verify it
Ⅴ. Special notes for reviews

commit.message: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/seata/seata into config_opt

nodes.bodyText:
true-> DEFALT_CLIENT_REPORT_SUCCESS_ENABLE
and recommended that the default value of keys be put into a special class

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,20 +6,20 @@ transport {
   #enable heartbeat
   heartbeat = true
   # the client batch send request enable
-  enable-client-batch-send-request = true
+  enableClientBatchSendRequest = true
   #thread factory for netty
-  thread-factory {
-    boss-thread-prefix = "NettyBoss"
-    worker-thread-prefix = "NettyServerNIOWorker"
-    server-executor-thread-prefix = "NettyServerBizHandler"
-    share-boss-worker = false
-    client-selector-thread-prefix = "NettyClientSelector"
-    client-selector-thread-size = 1
-    client-worker-thread-prefix = "NettyClientWorkerThread"
+  threadFactory {
+    bossThreadPrefix = "NettyBoss"
+    workerThreadPrefix = "NettyServerNIOWorker"
+    serverExecutorThread-prefix = "NettyServerBizHandler"
+    sharebossWorker = false

nodes.bodyText: Whether these changes can be undo?
@slievrly @xingfudeshi Whether to change to default false in 1.1.0?
globalTable and branchTable have wrong values
